text: When a decision is taken by Almighty God to destroy a community, it is enough for Him to direct the forces of nature against it: He does not need to utilise heavenly forces for the purpose. People always mock or ridicule the one who appears to them to be of a low status. This was the case with the prophets. The prophetsâ€™ personalities were underestimated by the people and they were considered of too low a standing to represent the Divine Truths.
